reviewText: "Cuore" was one of the reading books at the elementary school, many, many years ago. Realistic description, memorable recollection of the early 1days of 900 at an Elementary school in northern Italy. Unfortunately there is no english translation, so italian is quite important to understand the message of its author, Edmondo De Amicis. To correct this problem you can get thru Amazon, the english version of the book, called Hearth
